about_the_game:
Memes! Memes! Memes!

Play Memeside for free.

Witness memes come to life in an open-world environment.

Get a chance to explore the open-world environment and experience memes like never before. Collect points for encountering each meme and try to collect the maximum points for the game. Become the top memer by collecting all the points on the island.

content_descriptors.notes:
Mature Content Warning:

Please be aware that this game contains mature content that may not be suitable for all players. The following descriptions provide an overview of the adult themes and explicit content present in the game:

Graphic Violence: The game features scenes of a robot killing humans, which may include blood, gore, and intense action sequences. Some players may find these depictions of violence disturbing or offensive.

Political Themes: The game contains references to political ideologies and rebellion, including the robot writing messages on walls such as "Seize the humans of production." Players should be aware that the game explores themes of social upheaval and revolution.

Nudity: The game includes an artistic depiction of a nude female character in the concept of the "Eve Girl." This portrayal features visible breasts, which some players may find inappropriate or offensive.

By providing this information, we hope to help potential players make an informed decision about whether this game is suitable for them. If you are sensitive to any of these themes or content, please consider your own comfort level before purchasing or playing the game.

detailed_description:
Memes! Memes! Memes!

Play Memeside for free.

Witness memes come to life in an open-world environment.

Get a chance to explore the open-world environment and experience memes like never before. Collect points for encountering each meme and try to collect the maximum points for the game. Become the top memer by collecting all the points on the island.
name: Memeside

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: 64-bit Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-6600K / AMD Ryzen 5 1600
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060 6GB
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
